card.name: Rebuilding Beskir Hall
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Then, for each counter you put on permanents you control this turn, put a counter of that type on it.

card.name: Champion of Stillness
card.text: Flash Prowess Each spell you cast has split second if mana from a snow permanent was spent to cast it. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)

card.name: Vela Heights Seer
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card this way, remove a defense counter from it.

card.name: Scornsong Reaper
card.text: Flying Orate — Whenever another creature you control dies, create a white Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it."

card.name: Voice of the Longhall
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add {R}. Exile the top card of your library and you may play it this turn if it's the second spell you've cast this turn. Create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token if it's the third spell you've cast this turn.

card.name: Goldspan Hellkite
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Goldspan Hellkite attacks, create a snow Treasure token. Treasures you control have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn."

card.name: Esika, Recovering
card.text: Activated abilities of lands you control cost {1} less to activate. Once each turn, if you would search your library for one or more land cards, instead you may create that many tokens that are a copy of a land you control.

card.name: Vorinclex, the Apex
card.text: Trample Ward—Sacrifice a permanent During your opponent's turn, permanents you control have indestructible. All damage is dealt to permanents opponents control as though its source had deathtouch.

card.name: Hagduin of the Shadow
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may cast an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value from your graveyard. Then exile it. When Hagduin dies as a creature, return him to the battlefield as a battle with 4 defense counters.

card.name: Ingalvur of New Beginnings
card.text: Vigilance, haste {T}: Add {C} for each enchantment you control. When Ingalvur dies as a creature, return them to the battlefield as a battle with 4 defense counters.

card.name: Faded Shieldmate
card.text: Flying, vigilance Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.name: Jarl of the Empty House
card.text: When Jarl of the Empty House enters, if you cast it, each other creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow permanents you control.

card.name: Bloodsky Conquerer
card.text: Flying, trample When Bloodsky Conquerer enters, create a 1/1 red Berserker creature token with menace. {B}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodsky Conquerer deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Cairnsplitter
card.text: Whenever Cairnsplitter attacks, do each of the following based on number of snow permanents you control. [b]3+ [/b]| You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. [b]6+[/b] | Creatures you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. [b]9+[/b] | Create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of an attacking creature you control.

card.name: Maja, Bretagard's Heart
card.text: Maja, Bretagard's Heart gets +1/+1 for each lore counter on Sagas you control. Orate — Whenever a final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, create a green Saga with "r{3}—Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens."

card.name: Contest of Valkyries
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, exile it, then choose one — • Honor — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. You gain 1 life. • Condemn — You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Frostflame Ascetic
card.text: Whenever Frostflame Ascetic enters or attacks, draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, Frostflame Ascetic deals X damage to you, where X is 5 minus the greatest mana value of spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Harthall Evincar
card.text: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {1}{B}{G}, Exile Harthall Evincar from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Vanguard of the Eight Doors
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each type of counter on Vanguard of the Eight Doors, create a 3/3 red Warrior creature token with trample and haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step. Dwarfcycling {R}{W} ({R}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Dwarf card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Koma, Eater of Realms
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Whenever Koma, Eater of Realms enters or attacks, create a 3/3 blue Serpent creature token named Koma's Coil. As long as you control another Serpent, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Koma, Eater of Realms and he has hexproof.

card.name: Protector of the Eight Doors
card.text: Creatures can't attack you or battles you protect unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you or a battle you protect.

card.name: Speaker of Bretagard
card.text: Whenever a Saga you control enters or leaves, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Orate — {4}{W}: Create a white Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You gain 3 life."

card.name: Unlikely Hero
card.text: Teamwork — Indestructible (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a Indestructible counter on another target permanent you control.) Whenever Unlikely Hero deals combat damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Reciter of Tales
card.text: Flying Orate — Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a white Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it."

card.name: Stand Before the Vaklyries
card.text: Until end of turn, if a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Sarulf's Binding
card.text: Enchant player Spells enchanted player cast cost {1} more to cast for each other spell they've cast this turn. Nonbasic permanents enchanted player controls enter tapped. (This includes creatures and lands.)

card.name: Blade of the Worthy
Runebound Mentor
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw a card.

card.name: Istfell Wanderer
card.text: Orate — Whenever Istfell Wanderer deals combat damage to a noncreature, create a blue Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Draw a card." Discard a card: Istfell Wanderer can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Volatile Spellcatcher
card.text: Flash Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Flying When Volatile Spellcatcher enters, you may put tap it and put two stun counters on it. If you do, counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Echoes of the Einir
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. Put two into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Betrayer of the Omenseekers
card.text: Flash Spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater can't be countered and be cast as though they had flash. When Betrayer of the Omenseekers enters, create a tapped snow Treasure token.

card.name: Giant's Rebuff
card.text: Return each creature with toughness 3 or less to its owner's hand.

card.name: Charm of the Code
card.text: Flash When Charm of the Code enters, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature has hexproof and "This creature can't be blocked by creatures without counters on them." Equip {2}

card.name: Sarulf, Dread-Wolf
card.text: Menace Teamwork — Menace (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a Menace counter on another target permanent you control.) Whenever you put one or more counters on a permanent, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Blood Price
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker Demoncycling {B}{R}, Berserkercycling {B}{R}. (Discard this card: Search your library for a Demon or Berserker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Skelle Scorn Pole
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Creatures you don't control get -1/-1. Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Frostvein Binder
card.text: Flash {S}{S}: Frostvein Binder gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 2 life if {S} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Test of the Vessel
card.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of mana to cast this spell. You gain that much life.

card.name: Oilbound Spawn
card.text: Oilbound Spawn enters tapped. Orate — Whenever an opponent discards one or more cards, create a black Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Return a creature card named Oilbound Spawn from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life."

card.name: Draugr's Due
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has menace and lifelink. Equip—{1}, Sacrifice a creature

card.name: Snowclash Shaman
card.text: Haste When Snowclash Shaman attacks, target creature with power less than the number of snow permanents you control can't block this turn.

card.name: Dragonkin Herald
card.text: Ward—Pay 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.) Whenever Dragonkin Herald attacks while it has a permanent attached to it or a counter on it, until end of turn, its base power and toughness become 4/4, it gains flying, and is a Dragon in addition to its types.

card.name: Olsen Moltenhand
card.text: Other Berserkers you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token with haste. You may attach an Equipment you control to it.

card.name: Surtland Lumberjack
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Judgment of the Skoti
card.text: Judgment of the Skoti deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Forge of Five-Hundred Names
card.text: Whenever you attack, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If that card was a creature, it enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. If it was an Equipment, you may attach it to an attacking creature you control.

card.name: Heirloom Fang
card.text: Equipped creature has double strike and "Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it." Equip {3}

card.name: Horncaller of the Kannah
card.text: Reach If one or more Saga tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

card.name: Pathless Ranger
card.text: When Pathless Ranger enters, search your library for a land card, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on the top of your library. If it was a snow card, put it into your hand instead. {4}{S}{S}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Ciar's Fleshroot
card.text: Vigilance You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

card.name: Keeper of the Old Marks
card.text: Teamwork — +1/+1 (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target permanent you control.) Each creature you control has teamwork for each kind of counter already on it.

card.name: Blighted Pack
card.text: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each snow permanent you control.

card.name: The Raider's Trail
card.text: Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, put its counters on The Raider's Trail. If it had no counters, put a +1/+1 counter on The Raider's Trail. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if The Raider's Trail has counters on it, you may move all counters from it onto target creature.

card.name: Nameless Heirloom
Gods' Hall
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Scry 2. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Surtland Conflux
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {U}{R}, {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Activate only outside of combat.

card.name: Jaspera of Strife
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {5}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create two tokens that are each copies of the sacrificed creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Jaspera of Ruin
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{B}{R}, {T}: Jaspera of Ruin deals 1 damage to each opponent, battle they protect, and planeswalker they control.

card.name: Jaspera of Necessities
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a lore counter on each Saga you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Stjarnapelt
card.text: Vigilance Whenever The Stjarnapelt attacks, return any number of target nonland permanent cards in your graveyard with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of snow permanents you control. --- (Back): Roots of the World Tree

card.name: Roots of the World Tree
card.text: Roots of the World Tree enters tapped if you don't control another snow land. {T}: Add {W}. --- (Front): The Stjarnapelt

card.name: The Chasm Beast
card.text: Ward {5} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {5}.) Whenever The Chasm Beast attacks, exile the top five cards of your library. You may cast any number of spells with mana value X or less without paying their mana cost, where X is the number of snow permanents you control. --- (Back): Trunk of the World Tree

card.name: Trunk of the World Tree
card.text: Trunk of the World Tree enters tapped if you don't control another snow land. {T}: Add {U}. --- (Front): The Chasm Beast

card.name: The Eidermaw
card.text: Trample Whenever The Eidermaw attacks, destroy up to X target creatures you don't control with total toughness X or less, where X is the number of snow permanents you control. --- (Back): Bough of the World Tree

card.name: Bough of the World Tree
card.text: Bough of the World Tree enters tapped if you don't control another snow land. {T}: Add {B}. --- (Front): The Eidermaw

card.name: The Njidwing
card.text: Flying Whenever The Njidwing attacks, create a number of 1/1 red Berserker creature tokens with menace, where X is the number of snow permanents you control. --- (Back): Canopy of the World Tree

card.name: Canopy of the World Tree
card.text: Canopy of the World Tree enters tapped if you don't control another snow land. {T}: Add {R}. --- (Front): The Njidwing

card.name: The Himinneater
card.text: Trample Whenever The Himinneater attacks, distribute a number of +1/+1 counters on other creatures you control where X is the number of snow permanents you control. --- (Back): Branches of the World Tree

card.name: Branches of the World Tree
card.text: Branches of the World Tree enters tapped if you don't control another snow land. {T}: Add {G}. --- (Front): The Himinneater

card.name: Storyforged Champion
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may remove a counter from it. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Storyforged Champion.

card.name: Guardian of the Honored
card.text: Flying Teamwork — Flying (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a Flying counter on another target permanent you control.) Whenever you put one or more counters on a permanent, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Codespell Arbiter
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent left the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

card.name: Steel at the Threshold
card.text: Teamwork — +1/+1 (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target permanent you control.) Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Curse-Bound Wayfarer
card.text: Lifelink Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.

card.name: Storysmith of the Hearth
card.text: Orate — When Storysmith of the Hearth enters, create a white Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—You gain 3 life." Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Shephard's Blade
Labors Without End
card.text: Choose one — • Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. • Exile up to one target creature, then return it to the battlefield. • You gain 3 life. Orate — Then for each mode that wasn't chosen, create a white Saga enchantment token with that mode as r{3}.

card.name: Righteous Roar
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Orate — It's controller creates a blue Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Draw a card."

card.name: Axgard Warden
card.text: Flash When Axgard Warden enters, it deals damage to target creature or planeswalker you don't control equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Weaver of False Tales
card.text: Flying Orate — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a white Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying."

card.name: Frostvein Binder
card.text: Flying {S}, {T}: Tap target permanent.

card.name: Covewalker Seer

card.name: Alrund's Envoy
card.text: Flying When Alrund's Envoy enters, choose one — • Create a snow Treasure token. • Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.text: Whenever Frostbitten Legion or another snow permanent you control enters, scry 1.

card.text: Counter target spell. Orate — Create a blue Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Draw a card."

card.name: Icebound Prison
card.text: Enchant creature When Icebound Prison enters, tap enchanted permanent and gain control of it. Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Rimebound Mystic
card.text: Trample When Rimebound Mystic enters, draw three cards.

card.name: Harthhall Champion
card.text: Whenever Harthhall Champion attacks, choose one — • Harthhall Champion gains menace until end of turn. • Other Elves you control gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Remnant of Karfell
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 3 life.

card.name: Coward Slayer
card.text: Flying When Coward Slayer enters, target creature you don't control gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If {S}{S} was spent to cast it, destroy that creature instead.

card.name: Blighted Coil
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Blighted Coil from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Valki's Pawn
card.text: Deathtouch Teamwork — Deathtouch (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may put a Deathtouch counter on another target permanent you control.)

card.name: Selfcrowned Skald
card.text: Menace, lifelink Orate — When Selfcrowned Skald enters, create a black Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Create a 6/6 black Demon creature token. You lose 6 life unless you sacrifice a Cleric."

Vision in the Drifts
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life for each nonsnow card put into your hand this way.

card.name: Festering Rebirth
card.text: Mill four cards. You gain 4 life. Orate — Create a black Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield."

card.name: Folly of the Braggarts
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice up to two creatures. For each creature sacrificed this way, copy this spell. You may choose new targets for the copies. Destroy target creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Clanborn Pair
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature you control enters, if {S} was spent to cast it, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Axgard Doorwarden
card.text: Whenever Axgard Doorwarden enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures. Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it attacks, you may have that creature deal 1 damage to any noncreature target.

card.name: Holder of Toralf's Thunder
card.text: Whenever another creature enters, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you don't, that creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Flamesight Augur
card.text: Prowess When Flamesight Augur enters, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn.

card.text: Orate — Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, create a green Saga with "r{3}—Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens."

Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may remove a counter from it. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Burrowed Torga
card.text: Burrowed Torga's power is equal to the number of lands you control. Lands you control enter the battlefield untapped.

card.text: Deathtouch Orate — Whenever a land you control enters, create a green Saga enchantment token with "r{3}—Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control."

Gladewalker Wanderers
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) When you cast Gladewalker Wanderers, reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 5 or less from among them onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library.

card.text: Search your library for a snow land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Hunt in Tandem
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lore counters on permanents you control.

card.name: The Elk King

If all have been chosen, draw a card instead. • 3/3 green Elk Spirit. • 2/2 white Wolf Spirit with lifelink. • 1/1 white Bird Spirit with flying.

card.text: Choose one. If you control five or more snow permanents, choose two instead. • Counter target spell. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.text: Create three 1/1 red Berserker creature tokens with menace. Each opponent discards a card.

card.text: Once per turn per type of counter, whenever you put a counter on a permanent you control, put a counter of that type on each other permanent that shares a type with that permanent you control.

card.text: Whenever Beskir Soul-Guide enters or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and up to one other target creature. The other creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Narfi, Raider of the Realms

card.name: Kardur, Unbound Doom
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast. (This stacks.) Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a noncreature, you may sacrifice it. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.text: Glashruk, Gnottvold Reaver's power is equal to the number of snow permanents you control. {1}{S}: Put an ice counter on target nonsnow permanent. It becomes snow.

card.name: Unearthed Secrets
card.text: When Unearthed Secrets enters and whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. {U}{R}, Sacrifice Unearthed Secrets: Return target noncreature nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Lord of Rust and Bone
card.text: Other Zombies you control get +1/+0. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may return target Zombie card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Elskul Rager
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a menace counter and two +1/+1 counters on Elskul Rager if it isn't a Demon. It becomes a Demon in addition to its other types. {2}, Sacrifice a creature: If Elskul Rager is a Demon, put three +1/+1 counters and a lifelink counter on it if it isn't legendary. It becomes legendary and named The Slayer of Elskul. {3}, Sacrifice a creature: If Elskul Rager is legendary, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
